PHRASE.LANG: Buy all four companions and get four free t-shirts! This bundle contains four flying companions: Skully, Skelette, Scalaca and Skullbat, as well as a grey t-shirt, and anothe grey t-shirt with a nest on the shoulder for your companion to land in. [#Legal]

Achetez les quatre compagnons et recevez quatre t-shirts gratuits! Contient quatre compagnons volants: Skully, Skullbat, Skelette et Scalaca, ainsi qu'un t-shirt gris, et un autre t-shirt gris avec un nid sur l'épaule pour votre compagnon. [#Legal]
Kaufen Sie vier Begleiter, mit vier freie T-shirts. [#Legal]
Riceve quattro liberi t-shirts con questi quattro compagni. [#Legal]
Recibe cuatro camisetas gratis con estos cuatro compañeros. [#Legal]

Buy all four companions and get four free t-shirts! This bundle contains four flying companions: Skully, Skelette, Scalaca and Skullbat, as well as a gray t-shirt, and anothe gray t-shirt with a nest on the shoulder for your companion to land in. [#Legal]
